metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11033 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: The DCTStream::readHuffSym function in Stream.cc in the DCT decoder in xpdf before 4.00 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted JPEG data.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> reproducer doesn't seem to crash poppler, marking as not-affected

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
